title: To the right honourable, the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament the humble petition of the inhabitants in the county of Lincoln.
author: England and Wales. Parliament. Proceedings. 1644-05-27. aut
notes: A petition to retain Colonel Edward King as the head of county government; includes the favorable reply from Parliament dated: "27. Maij. 1644." and signed: H. Elsynge, Cler. Parl.
Copy cropped along right margin, with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
